solution_line_template: It will take her {run_distance} miles / {run_speed} mph * ({minutes_per_hour} minutes / {hours_per_hour} hour) = <<{run_distance}/{run_speed}*{minutes_per_hour}={time_to_run}>>{time_to_run} minutes to run half a mile.

It will take her {walk_distance} miles / {walk_speed} mph * ({minutes_per_hour} minutes / {hours_per_hour} hour) = <<{walk_distance}/{walk_speed}*{minutes_per_hour}={time_to_walk}>>{time_to_walk} minutes to walk half a mile.
